locations.name: El'goroth
locations.description: A vast and ancient Elf kingdom, known for its breathtaking landscapes and rich magical heritage.

plot.title: The Lost Relic of El'goroth
plot.description: A powerful relic has been lost deep within the kingdom, and it's up to Shu to find it before it falls into the wrong hands.

locations.name: Eldrid Forest
locations.description: A dense and enchanted forest, home to ancient magic and mythical creatures.

plot.title: The Heart of the Forest
plot.description: A dark force threatens to destroy the balance of nature in Eldrid Forest, and it's up to Shu to stop it.

locations.name: Kragnir
locations.description: A vast underground complex, home to the ancient Dwarves and their rich history.

plot.title: The Lost Mine of Kragnir
plot.description: A powerful mine has been lost deep within the halls, and it's up to Shu to find it before a rival faction does.

locations.name: The Undercroft
locations.description: A vast and mysterious expanse, home to ancient ruins and hidden secrets.

plot.title: The Undercroft Expedition
plot.description: A group of explorers has gone missing in the Undercroft, and it's up to Shu to find them before they succumb to the dangers within.

npcs.name: El'goroth the King
npcs.description: The wise and just ruler of El'goroth, known for his wisdom and magical prowess.

npcs.name: Lyra the Mage
npcs.description: A powerful and skilled mage, tasked with protecting the kingdom from threats both within and without.

npcs.name: Keldorn the Guardian
npcs.description: A stalwart and loyal guard, tasked with protecting the kingdom from external threats.

npcs.name: Elyria the Druid
npcs.description: A powerful and ancient druid, tasked with maintaining the balance of nature in Eldrid Forest.

npcs.name: Thorn the Troll
npcs.description: A fearsome and powerful troll, tasked with protecting the forest from those who would seek to harm it.

npcs.name: Lila the Fairy
npcs.description: A delicate and enigmatic fairy, tasked with maintaining the balance of nature in Eldrid Forest.

npcs.name: Grimgold the Chief
npcs.description: A seasoned and respected leader, tasked with guiding his people through times of turmoil.

npcs.name: Brokk the Smith
npcs.description: A skilled and resourceful smith, tasked with crafting and maintaining the equipment of his people.

npcs.name: Dagna the Healer
npcs.description: A compassionate and skilled healer, tasked with caring for the physical and emotional wounds of her people.

npcs.name: Xandros the Explorer
npcs.description: A seasoned and skilled explorer, tasked with uncovering the secrets of the Undercroft.

npcs.name: Vora the Seeker
npcs.description: A mysterious and enigmatic seeker, tasked with uncovering the secrets of the Undercroft.

npcs.name: Kethril the Pirate
npcs.description: A cunning and skilled pirate, tasked with claiming the riches of the Undercroft for himself.

player_character.name: Shu
player_character.description: A skilled and fearless adventurer, driven by a thirst for knowledge and discovery.
